name: get-bacterial-transformation-protocol
title: Bacterial Transformation Protocol
description: Get standard protocol for transforming DNA into competent E. coli cells
content:
Overview

This application provides a detailed bacterial transformation protocol optimized for your specific needs.

Features

  • Standard heat shock protocol
  • Customized for antibiotic selection
  • Special handling for repetitive sequences
  • Complete step-by-step instructions

Parameters

  • Antibiotic: Selection marker (e.g., ampicillin, kanamycin)
  • Repetitive: Specify if sequence contains repeats

Output

Returns complete transformation protocol with timing, temperatures, and helpful notes.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/get_bacterial_transformation_protocol.py --antibiotic "${antibiotic}" ${repetitive} -o "${outputDir}"

spec.name: antibiotic
spec.label: Selection Antibiotic
spec.description: Antibiotic for selection (e.g., ampicillin, kanamycin, chloramphenicol)

spec.name: repetitive
spec.label: Repetitive Sequence
spec.description: Enter '--repetitive' if sequence contains repetitive elements (leave empty otherwise)

spec.name: outputDir
spec.label: Output Directory
spec.description: Select or create a stash folder where protocol will be saved
